name: Jury Rigg
description:
Short exploratory non-violent Metroidvania.  Run around fixing leaky barrels to reboot an automated factory.  No sound or really a story since I ran out of time.  Sorry  :(

A and D move.  W fixes things.

L Jumps

K uses the items you pick up throughout the game.

Q and E swap through the items.  There are 3 total, plus an anti gravity generator you can turn on.  The entire game can be completed in about 10 minutes, 5 if you are fast.
